entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers early this evening. 60 percent chance of rain showers or wet flurries before morning. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light after midnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 02 March 2023
